hadiths.text: Abdullah b. 'Umar reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:He who gives up his share in a slave, and he has money enough to meet the full price, a fair price for him should be fixed; otherwise be has emancipated him to the extent that he has emancipated

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَعْتَقَ شِرْكًا لَهُ فِي عَبْدٍ
chapter.eng-name: One who frees his share in a slave
